name: Equator Hights
description:
Destroy a space station by dropping it into a vortex!

Play instructions:

Hold one hand up with you palm facing away from you and you finger straight upwards to float in the direction you facing.

Press the recall button to see the sequence needed to start the monitor bay shutdown sequence and then press the buttons in the order they where lit.

The get out before the red counter gets to 0!

Runs in Direct To Rift Mode but you can select the secondary display
